review: I wish it interacted with desktops easier. It works just great with an android phone. You need a bit of support apps to make it work with the desktop and I have yet to get it to work on my iMac.
author: Chris Meyers

review: I wish other things you buy in life worked as well as this. It sure beats the old HDMI cables. It's amazing how well this works once you get the hang of it. I would recommend this as a great gift, either for yourself or family. Easily a five star purchase and product.
author: Kevin

review: Had issues with my iPhone5 and my hotspot. I switched to iPhone6 and Comcast. No issues so far.

review: Couldn't be happier! Only hope that more apps support it (like Fox Sports Go).
